about_the_game:
CUTE and RELAXING MERGE PUZZLE

Drop cute foods into a hot pot, merge them, and try to get higher score until foods overflow out of the pot.

OVER 30 UNIQUE ITEMS HELP YOU MAKE the BEST HOT POT EVER

Every time you merging foods, you also gain experience point.
Each level increase provides you the choice of three items that help you much.
Discover synergies, utilize them effectively, and solve the tough situations.

MERGE STREAK FOR MORE ITEMS!

Keep up a merge streak to get more exp points.
As your streak gets bigger and bigger, you'll receive more and more items as rewards!

RELEASE VERSION FEATURES

■Unique game modes
■More variety of items
■No level cap
■Worldwide Daily and Monthly Leaderboards
■Achievements
■Future Updates
■Feeding dev
